CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Config.​ProjectConfig
public
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Config.​ProjectConfig

A class representing the entire project configuration from Project.txt or equivalent sources.

Functions
ProjectConfig
public ProjectConfig (
Config.Source source
)
Properties
Source
public Config.Source Source { get }

The Config.Source of the entire configuration.

ProjectConfigFolder
public Path ProjectConfigFolder { get; set }

The Path where the project configuration is stored, or null if it hasn't been set.

WorkingDataFolder
public Path WorkingDataFolder { get; set }

The Path where temporary working data is stored, or null if it hasn't been set.

ProjectInfo
public ProjectInfo ProjectInfo { get }

The ProjectInfo that applies to the entire project.  The object will always be defined, though the properties inside it may not be.

InputTargets
public List<Targets.InputBase> InputTargets { get }

All the input targets defined in this file.  If there are none, the list will exist but be empty.

FilterTargets
public List<Targets.FilterBase> FilterTargets { get }

All the input filters defined in this file.  If there are none, the list will exist but be empty.

OutputTargets
public List<Targets.OutputBase> OutputTargets { get }

All the output targets defined in this file.  If there are none, the list will exist but be empty.

TabWidth
public int TabWidth { get; set }

The number of spaces in a tab, or zero if it's undefined.

DocumentedOnly
public bool DocumentedOnly { get; set }

Whether the documentation should be limited to code elements that are explicitly documented.  Check DocumentedOnlyPropertyLocation to determine whether it's defined.

AutoGroup
public bool AutoGroup { get; set }

Whether automatic grouping is on.  Check AutoGroupPropertyLocation to determine whether it's defined.

ShrinkFiles
public bool ShrinkFiles { get; set }

Whether to remove whitespace and comments from resource files like CSS and JavaScript in the output.

Property Locations
ProjectConfigFolderPropertyLocation
public PropertyLocation ProjectConfigFolderPropertyLocation { get; set }

Where the ProjectConfigFolder property is defined, or Source.NotDefined if it isn't.

WorkingDataFolderPropertyLocation
public PropertyLocation WorkingDataFolderPropertyLocation { get; set }

Where the WorkingDataFolder property is defined, or Source.NotDefined if it isn't.

TabWidthPropertyLocation
public PropertyLocation TabWidthPropertyLocation { get; set }

Where the TabWidth property is defined, or Source.NotDefined if it isn't.

DocumentedOnlyPropertyLocation
public PropertyLocation DocumentedOnlyPropertyLocation { get; set }

Where the DocumentedOnly property is defined, or Source.NotDefined if it isn't.

AutoGroupPropertyLocation
public PropertyLocation AutoGroupPropertyLocation { get; set }

Where the AutoGroup property is defined, or Source.NotDefined if it isn't.

ShrinkFilesPropertyLocation
public PropertyLocation ShrinkFilesPropertyLocation { get; set }

Where the ShrinkFiles property is defined, or Source.NotDefined if it isn't.
